Translations.Text: Inna: "day ur ak nni$ ara, kecc, s tidep, ur tezmioev, yidi, a pueboev, d awez$i
Inna: "ma steqsa$ k $ef t$awsa, deffir ta, ur teddu yidi. Ni$ ssutre$ ak d ssmae
Lean, armi bbwven ar imezda$ n yiwet n temdint, ssutren asen lqut. Ugin a ten snubgten. Ufan en leiv, qoib ad i$li. Iueggem it. Inna: "ma teb$iv, tzemrev a ppepwaxelluev $ef waya
Inna: "Tura a nemfaoaq. Ad ak d fke$ lmaana n wayen i$ef ur tezmirev a pueboev, d awez$i
Lbabuo nni, n igellilen i ixedmen di yill. B$i$ a t oee$, acku yiwen ugellid, deffir sen, itekkes yal lbabuo, s yi$il
Wanag ilemei nni, llan imawlan is d lmumnin. Nugad ad ieeppem fellasen tinufqa, tijehli
Neb$a ad asen d Irr, Mass nnsen, it yifen: win iufan, iqeoben nezzeh aeunu

Wanag leiv, n sin warrac igujilen n temdint. Illa ugerruj seddaw as, i nitni. Babat sen d argaz ilhan. Mass ik Ib$a, ard im$uoen, ara d ssuff$en agerruj nnsen. D aeunu s$uo Mass ik. Ur t xdime$ s lameo iw. D tagi ay d lmaana n wayen i$ef ur tezmioev a pueboev
Steqsan k $ef Bu sin wacciwen. Ini: "ad awen d awi$, fellas, asmekti
S tidep, Nefka yas di tmurt, u Nsehhel as iberdan di yal cci
Iiief yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda i$elli yiiij. Iufa i$elli $ef tala ilu$en. Iufa n $uoes agdud. Nenna: "a Bu sin wacciwen, aaqeb iten, ne$ lhu $uosen
Inna: "win idensen a t naaqeb, sinna, ad iu$al ar Mass is at Iaaqeb aaaqeb unekkao
Wanag i win iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, akafi igerzen. Ad as Nini i isehlen si lameo nne£
Sinna, ilea d yiwen n ubrid
armi sanda d ineqqeo yiiij. Iufa n ineqqeo ed $ef ugdud, iwumi ur Nefki ar at isdarin segs
Am akka. Ni$ ibbwev a£ d akw usali s
Sinna, idda d yiwen n ubrid
armi ibbwev ger sin iediden. Iufa, deffir sen, agdud qoib ur fehhmen awal
Nnan: "a Bu sin wacciwen, s tidep, Iaouo akked Maouo la ssefsaden di tmurt. A k nxelleu ma terriv uuuo garane$ yidsen
Inna: "yif it iyi Ifka Mass iw. Efket iyi afus, ad rre$ uuuo garawen yidsen
Awit iyi d tiqaumtin n wuzzal alamma irgel wayen illan ger idurar". Inna: "uuvet alamma tekker degs tmes. Awit iyi d ad smire$ fellas nneas ifsin
D$a ur zmiren a t id zegren, ur zmiren a t id flun
Inna: "ayagi d aeunu s$uo Mass iw. Mi d tusa lemaahda n Mass iw, a t Isawi. Lemaahda n Mass iw d tidep
Assen, a ten Neoo ad ddehmen wa $ef wa. Auuvu di lbuq, d$a a ten Nessemlil akw
A d Nessken nezzeh Loahennama, assen, i ijehliyen
wid iwumi seurrment wallen nnsen, mgal asmekti W. Llan ur zmiren i usemees
Day $ilen, wid ijehlen, ad rren imdanen iW, d imawlan war Nek? Ih, Nhegga Loahennama, d axxam i ijehliyen
Ini: "ad awen mle$ at igiten imexsuoen sennig wiyav
Wid iwumi iweddeo laatab nnsen di tmeddurt n ddunit, wanag nitni nwan gerzen igi
Widak d wid i inekoen issekniyen n Mass nnsen, akked temlilit yideS. Mean igiten nnsen. Ur ten Nwezzen, ass n tnekra
Atan uqeiii nnsen: Loahennama, imi jehlen, u mmaalken deg issekniyen iW, akked imazanen iW
Ma d wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, axxam nnsen d leonanat n Loennet
Degs ad wekkoen, ur ssuturen ayen nniven
Ini: "lemmer ill d lmidad, i wawalen n Mass iw, ad iqqao yill, uqbel ad fukken wawalen n Mass iw, xas a d nawi i t icban n lmidad
Ini: "nek d amdan kan, am kunwi. Weeean iyi d ar Oebbi nnwen, d Oebbi Yiwen. Win issaramen timlilit n Mass is, ad ixdem ayen ilhan, ur ipcarak yiwen deg waabad n Mass is
Khiau
Asmekti ueunu n Mass ik, i umdan iS Zakarya
mi iger, i Mass is, ti$oi tabavnit
Inna: "a Mass iw! S tidep, oeent laavam iw, aqeoou ioeq si ccib. A Mass iw! Anuju $uoeK uroin iyi isnu$ben
Nek ugade$ llzem iw, deffir i. Tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot. Efk iyi d lfeox s$uoeK
ad iyi iwoet, ad iwoet si twacult n Yaaqub. Err it, a Mass iw, d win iouvan
A Zakarya, s tidep, Nbecceo ik s uqcic, ism is Yeeya. Ur Nefki, i yiwen, ism agi, uqbel is
Inna: "a Mass iw! Amek ara sau$ aqcic, tameiiut iw d tiaiqeot, u nek $emqe$ di tewser
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass ik: ayagi ishel fellI. Ni$ Xelqe$ k, zik, ur telliv d acemma
Inna: "a Mass iw! Efk iyi d assekni". Inna: "assekni ik, ur tepmeslayev i medden, krav wavan, ur tuvnev
Iffe$ ed ar ugdud is, si lemqam. Iweeea yasen ad anzen uubee, tameddit
A Yeeya, eiief Tazmamt, s loehd". D uuebyan, Nefka yas uuwab
lmaenana akked uufawa, s$uone£. Ipeezzib
ibedd i imawlan is; ur illi d aqehhao ne$ d amaaui
Tifrat fellas asmi d ilul, asmi ara immet, asmi ara d iu$al d amuddir
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Meryem, asmi taazel iman is, si twacult is, di tama ugmuv
Terra ssteo garas yidsen. Nuzen as d ooue nne£. £uoes, amzun d amdan ifuqen
Tenna: "ad iyi Eerz Uenin, segk, ma tepeezzibev
Inna: "nek, d amersul kan n Mass im, ad am fke$ aqcic iufan
Tenna: "amek ara sau$ aqcic, ur iyi innul umdan, ur lli$ d tazennant
Inna: "Akka. Inna d Mass im: ayagi, ishel fellI. A t Nerr d assekni i medden, d aeunu s$uone£. D lameo ippueeppmen
Tebbwi tadist; syis taazel iman is, di tama ibaaden
Bdan p id inzikmiren ar loedra n tezdayt. Tenna: "anna$ lemmer mmute$, uqbel ayagi, ad pwappu$ akw
Issawel as d, seddaw as: "kkes a$wbel, ih, Mass im Irra i$eeo, seddaw am
Hucc, ar $uoem, loedra n tezdayt, ad am d i$li ppmeo amaynut ibwan
Ecc, ssew, ssefoee ieoi m. Ma twalav yiwen n umdan, ini as: nek, s tidep, ueame$ i Uenin, ur pmeslaye$, assa, i umdan
Toue yis ar ugdud is, tebbwi t. Nnan: "a Meryem! Ni$ tusiv d, s temsalt ihejjnen
A ultmas n Haoun, ur illi baba m d argaz ucmit, ur telli imma m d tazennant
Teswaad $uoes. Nnan: "amek ara nemmeslay i uuebyan di ddue
Inna: "nek d amdan n Oebbi. Ifka yi d Tazmamt. Irra yi d nnbi
Ioqa yi anda lli$. Iweuua yi taeallit, u zzakat, skud mazal iyi d amuddir
Ad bedde$ i yimma. Ur iyi Irri d aqehhao, ne$ d ccaqi
Tifrat felli asmi d lule$, asmi ara mmte$, asmi ara d u$ale$ d amuddir
D wagi ay d Aisa, mmi s n Meryem. D awal n tidep, i$ef cukken
Ur iuwib ara, i Oebbi, ad Isau kra n mmi S. Gedha syiS! Ma Iseyya lameo, ad as Yini kan: "ili"! Ad yili
Oebbi, s tidep, d Mass iw, d Mass nnwen. Ihi, aabdet eP. D wagi ay d abrid uwqim
Mgarraden ikabaren garasen. A tawa$it n wid ijehlen, mara walin ass abarar
Ara slen, ara walin, ass ideg ara d asen $uone£! Maca, imednas, assa, di ttelfan s uuee
Nabi ten, $ef ass n ssixia, mara iuao lameo. Nitni, di l$eflan, nitni ur uminen
Ih, d Nekwni, ara Iweoten tamurt akked wayen illan fellas. £uone£ tu$alin nnsen
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Iboahim. Ih, Neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Mi inna i baba s: "a baba! Acimi taabdev win ur nsell, ur nepwali, ur k ip$itin s wacemma
Ih, a baba, Nek ippunefk iyi d, si tmusni, ayen ur ak neppunefk. Ihi ddu yidi, a k nhu$ ar ubrid ilhan
A baba! Ur aabbed Cciian. Ni$ Cciian illa d amaauu i Uenin
A baba! Nek, ugade$ a k iwwet uaaqeb n Uenin, a ppiliv d ameddakwel n Cciian
Inna d: "day tugiv kecc, a Iboahim, ioebbiten iw? Ma ur tfukkev ara, war ccekk, a k oeome$! Iixxeo iyi tallit $wezzifen
Inna: "ili di tifrat. Ad ssutre$ i Mass iw, ad ak Isemmee. Neppa, s tidep, Iauzz iyi
Ad aazle$ iman iw segwen, akked wayen tepnujum, war Oebbi. Ad naaoe$ Mass iw, ahat, s unuju w, ar Mass iw, ur $webne$ ara
Mi iaazel iman is segsen akked wayen aabden, war Oebbi, Nefka yas Iseaq akked Yaaqub. Yal yiwen, Nerra t d nnbi
Nefka yasen seg ueunu nne£. Nerna yasen ccekoan umain, lfayeq
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Musa. Ih, neppa, illa d aaeovi, d amazan, d nnbi
Nessawel as d, si iieof ayeffus n udrar. Nessqeob it id, ad as Nmel
Nefka yas, seg ueunu nne£, gma s, Haoun, d nnbi
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Ismaail. Ih, neppa, illa d win ippaiafen di lemaahda s, d amazan, d nnbi
Iumeo i twacult is, taeallit, zzakat. Iouva t Mass is
Smekti d, di Tezmamt, Idris. Ih, neppa, illa d bab n tidep, d nnbi
Nessuli t s amkan aalayen
D wigi i I$at Oebbi, ger lambiyya, ger tarwa n Adem, ger wid i Nebbwi akked Nue, ger tarwa n Iboahim, akked Isoail, ger wid Nenha u Nefren. Ma $oan asen issekniyen n Uenin, ad $lin knan, s imeiiawen
Lxwelf nnsen d asatu i iooan taeallit, ddan d ccehwiyyat. Ad magren ttelfan
Kkes ed wid isteooaen, iumnen, xeddmen ayen ilhan. Wigi, ad kecmen Loennet, ur pwadensen s wacemma
Leonanat n Aaden i Iwaaaed Uenin, i imdanen iS, di tbavnit. Lemaahda S, s tidep, a ppevou
Ur sellen, degs, i yir awal, siwa: "tifrat"! Dinna, lqut nnsen, uubee, tameddit
D tagi ay d Loennet, ara Nerr d lweot, i wid ipeezziben, seg imdanen nne£
Ur d nepuubbu, siwa ma s lameo n Mass ik. IneS i illan zdat nne$, i illan deffir nne$, akked wayen illan garasen. Mass ik ur Iteppu
Mass n tmurt, igenwan, akked wayen illan garasen. Ihi, aabed iT, ili d imezgi deg uabad iS. Day tesnev win isaan ism iS
La iqqao umdan: "ma mmute$, day a yi d ssuff$en d amuddir
Day ur icfa ara umdan, ar t id Nxelq, zik, ur illi d acemma
S Mass ik, ara ten Nefser, nitni akked cwaien. Sinna, a ten Nerr ad zzin i Loahennama, $ef tgwecrar
Sinna, a d Nekkes, si yal arbaa, wid ibe$wven nezzeh, ar Uenin
Sinna, d Nekwni, war ccekk, i Isnen sennig akw, imenza ar tmeo$iwt
Akken tellam, a pqeobem $uoes. Akka, ar Mass ik, d aseyyi imueeppmen
Sinna, a Nsellek wid ipeezziben. A Neoo degs, imednas, $ef tgwecrar
Mara asen $oen issekniyen iberrzen nne£, qqaoen wid ijehlen i wid iumnen: "menyif sin irebbuyaa di temaict akw i lemwansa
Aceal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen, ifen ten tarkunt, uuifa
Ini: "ad Irnu Uenin di laameo, i im$eooqen, alamma walan acu i sen ippuwaaaden: d aaaqeb ne$ d imir. Ad eoen anwa illan deg umkan adiran mavi, ay d bu laaskeo uohifen mavi
Ad Irnu Oebbi nnhaya i wid ipwanhan. Ar Mass ik, leulae idumen ifen akafi, asisi
Ma twalav win iugin issekniyen nne£, u inna: "tarkunt, tarwa ad iyi ppunefkent, war ccekk
Aani issen tabavnit, ne$ iu$ lemaahda s$uo Uenin
Xaii, a Naru ayen inna. Ad as Nessi$wzef nezzeh aaaqeb
A Newoet ay d inna, a d ias $uone£, d aweid
Xtaoen, war Oebbi, ioebbiten ar asen d iawin tazmert
Xaii! Ad nekoen aabad nnsen, ad asen u$alen d ixuimen
Ur twalav ara, Nuzen ed ccwaien i ijehliyen, la ten laajen s ljuo
Ur peiri fellasen, la Nessalay kan leesab nnsen
Ass ideg ara Nefser wid ipeezziben ar Uenin, d imaaoaven
a Nenheo ijehliyen, d aqwvao, ar Loahennama
Ur sain ccafuaa, siwa win iu$en lemaahda ar Uenin
Nnan: "Isaa Uenin, aqcic
Ni$ tebbwim d abeaauq
Segs, qoib flan igenwan, tcerreg tmurt, grurjen idurar s edie
Gren aS mmi S, i Uenin
Ur iwjib ara, i Uenin, ad Isau mmi S
Akken llan di tmurt akked igenwan, siwa ay d iteddun, ar Uenin, s waabad
Ih, Ieseb iten, Issen nezzeh amvan nnsen
Akw a d asen $uoeS, ass n tnekra, yiwen yiwen
War ccekk, wid iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, a ten Iauzz Uenin
Nerra t kan d ushil, s tmeslayt ik, iwakken a pbeccoev, syis, wid ieezzben, u a pnedoev agdud iggernenn
Aceal isuta ay Nesqucc uqbel nnsen! Day a pmagrev yiwen degsen, ne$ a ppeslev i uswecwec nnsen
Ih
Ur ak d Nessader ara Leqwoan iwakken a p$weblev
D asmekti kan i win ippagwaden
D tarusi s$uo Win Ixelqen tamurt akked igenwan aalayen
Aenin i Iaanncen $ef usgeld
IneS i illan deg igenwan, i illan di tmurt, i illan garasen, i illan seddaw tmurt
Ma teaavev, ihi, Neppa Ieoa sser, akked wayen iffren sennig es
Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. IneS ismawen imxulaf
Ma tusa k id tequii n Musa
Mi iwala times, inna i twacult is: "qqimet dagi, nek wala$ times. Amar awen d awi$, segs, asafu, ne$ ad afe$, di tmes, nnhaya
Mi ibbwev $uoes, Ssawlen as d: "a Musa
Nek, s tidep, d Mass ik. Ekkes arkasen ik, ih, aql ak di Iuwa, ta$zut ioqan
Nek Smenyafe$ k, sell ed i uweeei
Nek, s tidep, d Oebbi, ur illi oebbi siwa Nek. Ihi, aabed iyI, eeal ilmend usmekti W
Imir, s tidep, a d ias. B$i$ a t Ffre$, iwakken yal yiwen a t Nkafi $ef wayen ixdem
£uoek a k issefoe$ fellas, win ur numin ara yis, i iddan d lhawiyya s! Mulac a pnegrev
D acu p tinna deg ufus ayeffus ik, a Musa
Inna: "d taakwazt iw, fellas tekkaye$, syis sse$laye$ d iferrawen i lmal iw. Sseqdace$ p i wayen nniven
Inna: "veggeo ip, a Musa
Iveggeo ip, tu$al d azrem, ippeenunuf
Inna: "ddem ip, ur ppagwad, ad as Nerr udem is amenzu
Eemev afus ik, s idis ik. A d iffe$ d amellal, ur ihlik. D assekni nniven
iwakken ad ak Nessken, seg issekniyen nne£ imeqwoaeanen
Oue ar Feraun. Neppa, s tidep, d aqehhao
Inna: "a Mass iw! Lli idmaren iw
Sehhel iyi lameo iw
Efsi tiyersi seg iles iw
ad fehmen awal iw
Efk iyi amaiwen di twacult iw
gma Haoun
Ssem$weo, syis, tazmert iw
Zdukkel it ar lameo iw
iwakken a K nesbuccaa aias
a K id nesmekti aias
Kecc, s tidep, la $ d Tepwaliv
Inna: "tepwaqbel tuppra k, a Musa
Ni$ Naateq ik, tikelt nniven
mi Nweeea, i yimma k, ayen i Nweeea
err it deg usenduq, veggeo it s asif. A t issers wasif deg uqeoqao, a t iddem ucengu W, u d acengu is. Fki$ ak si lmaenana W, a ppeppuoebbiv zdat wallen iW

Mi telea ultma k, tenna: "ma ad awen mle$ w ara itkelfen fellas"? Nerra k id i yimma k, ad fukken imeiiawen is, ur teezzen ara. Ten$iv amdan, Nsellek ik si le$wben. Njeooeb ik s lfetnat. Tzed$ev kra iseggwasen ar at Madian. Sinna, tusiv d s lqwedoa, a Musa
Smenyafe$ k i iman iW
Oueet, kecc akked gma k, s issekniyen iW, ur stehzayet $ef usmekti W
Oueet ar Feraun. Neppa, s tidep, d aqehhao
Mmeslayet as s wawal amelean, amar a d immekti, ne$ ad iagwad
Nnan: "a Mass nne$! Nugad ad a$ iglez, ne$ ad ijuo
Inna: "ur ppagwadet, Nek, war ccekk, yidwen, Selle$, Pwali
Oueet $uoes, tinem as: "nekwni d imazanen n Mass ik, seddu yidne$ At Isoail, ur ten ppaaqab ara. Aql a$ nusa k id s issekniyen n Mass ik. Tifrat i wi iddan d nnhaya
S tidep, neppuweeea d, ar ad ippuaaqeb win inekoen, iwexxoen
Inna: "anwa T Mass nnwen, a Musa
Inna: "Mass nne$ d Win Ifkan lxelq is i yal cci, sinna, Inha
Inna: "amek tevoa d isuta timezwura
Inna: "i ten Ieoan, d Mass iw, di Tezmamt. Mass iw ur I$ellev, ur Iteppu
Win i wen irran tamurt d ddue. Iga yawen degs iberdan. Issers ed aman seg igenni. Nessuffu$ ed yissen tiyugiwin n yal uuenf n le$ous
Eccet, ekset lmal nnwen. Deg waya, s tidep, d issekniyen i imawlan n ddehn
Segs, Nxelq ikwen; degs, a kwen Nerr; segs, a kwen id Nessuffe$, tikelt nniven
Ni$ Nessken as akw issekniyen nne£ inkeo, iugi
Inna: "day a$ d tusiv, s sseur ik, a Musa, ad a$ tessuff$ev seg wakal nne
War ccekk, ad ak d nawi sseur i t icban. Err garane$ yidek ppaaud, deg umekkan iwulmen, ur t nezgal, ur t tezgalev
Inna: "ppaaud nnwen ass n tme$oa, a d mlilen medden, di tuebeit
Izzi Feraun, ijmaa ed ccbukat is, d$a iusa d
Inna yasen Musa:"a tawa$it nnwen! Ur d garet tikerkas $ef Oebbi, a kwen Isxev s uaaqeb. Ni$ ad ixseo win d igren
Mcawaoen f lameo nnsen, ffren ayen mmeslayen
Nnan: "ihi, sin agi d iseeearen, b$an a kwen ssuff$en seg wakal nnwen, s sseur nnsen. Ad kksen abrid nnwen amxallef
Jemaat ed ccbukat nnwen, sinna aset ed d leufuf. Ni$ ad irbee, assa, win iufraren
Nnan: "a Musa! A pveggoev kecc, ne$ d nekwni ara iveggoen d imezwura
Inna: "xaii, veggoet"! Si sseur nnsen, iwala amzun leeeun imraren akked taakwzin nnsen
Musa, deg iman is, ieus i lxuf
Nenna: "ur ppagwad! Kecc, s tidep, sennig sen
Veggeo i illan deg ufus ik ayeffus! Ad isseblaa ay d snulfan". Ay d snulfan, siwa ccbukat iseeearen. Anda idda useeear, ur irebbee ara
£¨lin iseeearen, knan, nnan: "numen s Mass n Haoun akked Musa

Inna: "day tumnem yiS, uqbel i wen serree$? Neppa, zi$, d ameqwoan nnwen. Iseefv awen sseur. War ccekk, ad awen gezme$, avao sya, afus sya, u a kwen uemmoe$ af umidag n leodar n tezdayin. A ppeeoem, s tidep, anwa ay d bab uaaqeb meqqwoen, u ara idumen sennig wiyav
Nnan: "ur k nesmenyaf, d awez$i, i wayen i $ d iusan ubeggen, akw i Win i $ Ixelqen. Seyyi i k ihwan a pseyyiv. Aseyyi k, d aseyyi $ef tmeddurt n ddunit agi kan
Ih, numen s Mass nne$, iwakken ad a$ Isemmee tuccva nne$, akked wayen n sseur i teeppmev fellane$. Pifxio Oebbi d Imezgi
Ih, Loahennama i win iusan ar Mass is, d abe$wvi. Ur ipmeppat degs, ur d ippidir
Win i iusan $uoeS d lmumen u ixdem ayen ilhan, widak ad ilin deg imukan aalayen mavi
leonanat n Aaden, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, ad wekkoen din. Ayagi, d akafi i win zeddigen
Ni$ Nweeea i Musa: "oue, deg iv, akked imdanen iW. Egg asen abrid akiwan, di yill. Ur ppagwad a kwen in vefoen, ur ppiweic
Feraun, s iasekoiwen is, vefoen ten. Isseblaa ten yill, icca ten
Itlef Feraun agdud is, ur inhi
A yAt Isoail! Ni$ Nsellek ikwen seg ucangu nnwen. Nefka yawen ppaaud, ar loiha tayeffus n udrar. Nessers awen d lmenna, ifeoouoen
Eccet si lmakla ilhan, i s ikwen N$at. Ur zegret tilas fellas, mulac a kwen immager urrif iW. Win immuger urrif iW, ni$ igrareb
U Nek, s tidep, Psemmiee$ i win isteooaen, iumnen, ixeddmen ayen ilhan, d$a ipwanha
Acu i k i$euben seg ugdud ik, a Musa
Inna: "zgan deffir i. £awle$ d $ureK, a Mass iw, iwakken a Poaviv
Inna: "ih, ni$ Njeooeb agdud ik, deffir ek. Itelf iten Usamiri

Iu$al ed Musa s agdud is, s zzaaf d wumri. Inna: "a yagdud iw! Day ur awen Ifka ara, Mass nnwen, lemaahda laali? Day taaiiel fellawen lemaahda? Ne$ day teb$am a kwen immager urrif n Mass nnwen? Tzeglem ppaaud iw
Nnan: "ur nezgil ppaaud ik, s leb$i nne$. Maca, nbubb tiaakkwmin n ooeue n ugdud, d$a nveggeo iten. Akken i iveggeo Usamiri
Issuffe$ asen d aaejmi, d ameslux isrugmuten. Nnan: "wagi d oebbi nnwen u d oebbi n Musa. Ippu
Day ur walan ara, ur asen d ippara awal, ur izmir a ten ivuoo, ne$ a ten infaa
Ni$ Haoun inna yasen, uqbel: "a yagdud iw! Teppuhewwlem kan, yis. Mass nnwen, s tidep, d Aenin. Ddut yidi, vefoet lameo iw
Nnan: "ur tnepfukku akaber is, d awez$i, alamma iu$al ed Musa $uone
Inna: "a Haoun! D acu i k iiifen, mi ten twalav nnetlafen
Day ur teddiv ara yidi? Day tugiv lameo iw
Inna: "a mmi s n yimma! Ur iyi ppaiiaf si tamart iw, ne$ seg uqeoou w. Nek, s tideps, ugade$ ad iyi d tiniv: tessemfaoaqev At Isoail, ur tu$ev awal iw
Inna: "d acu t leqsed ik a Usamiri
Inna: "wala$ ayen ur walan. Ddme$ d tummeet n lateo umazan, veggoe$ p. Akka ay eusse$ deg iman iw

Inna: "oue ihi, a ppevou yidek di tmeddurt a ppeqqaoev: ur iyi pnalet! U, s tidep, $uoek ppaaud ik ur tezmirev a t tzeglev. Muqel oebbi ik, u$uo mazal teqqimev, ard a t nesseo$, a t ssebruzzaa ar yill, wakali
Mass nnwen, siwa Oebbi. Ur illi oebbi siwa Neppa. Tamusni S tjemmel yal cci
Akka i k Neekku, seg isallen n zik. Ni$ Nefka yak d, s$uone£, asmekti
Win i s iwexxoen, ad iaabbi taakkwemt, ass n tnekra
Ad wekkoen dinna. Ay dir ip fellasen ppaabga, ass n tnekra
Ass ideg ara d uuven di lbuq, a d Nefser ibe$wviyen, zgezwen assen
Ad swecwicen wa i wa: "mraw kan i teqqimem
Nekwni, Nif akw akken Nessen, ayen d qqaoen, mi sen inna yiwen umxallef degsen: "teqqimem kan ibwass
Steqsayen k $ef idurar. Ini: "a ten Issebruzzaa Mass iw, d iwzan
A ten Irr d aza$ao ibuoen
Ur tepwaliv degs i iaawjen, ne$ i izzren
Assen, ad vefoen aberrae, war zzrug. Ad irs uuut zdat Uenin, a ppeslev kan i uswecwec
Assen, ur ten tenfaa ccafuaa, siwa i win Iooa Uenin, u Iouva t $ef wawal
Issen i illan zdat sen, i illan deffir sen. Ur illi sanda ara T issinen
Ad iiinzen wudmawen i Umuddir n lebda. Ara ixesoen d win ibubben ddens
Win ixeddmen ayen ilhan, u neppa iumen, ur ippagwad ddens, ne$ aqhao
Akka, Nessers it id, d Leqwoan s taaoabt. Nenewwel ed, degs, aaeggen, amar ad eezben, u a ten id ias usmekti
D Ameqwoan Oebbi, Agellid, Tidep. Ur peiri, di t$uoi, uqbel ma ifukk uweeei s, $uoek. Ini: "a Mass iw! Ernu yi di tmusni
Ni$ Naahed, zik, Adem. Ippu, ur Nufi $uoes laazem
Mi Nenna i lmalayek: "knumt i Adem", knant, siwa Iblis i iugin
Nenna: "a Adem, wagi, s tidep, d acengu k, akked tmeiiut ik. £urwat a kwen id issuffe$, si Loennet, a p$weblem
Ih, kecc, degs, ur teplaeev, ur taarruv
S tidep, kecc, degs, ur tepfadev, ur k iiiuoou yiiij
I$wa t Cciian, inna: "a Adem, ad ak ssekne$ ttejoa uwekkeo, akw n tgelda n lebda
Eccan segs, d$a walan iman nnsen aaryan, bdan la tessoen iman nnsen, s iferrawen n Loennet. Adem iaaua Mass is, idda di le$wlav
Sinna, Ifren it Mass is, Issuref as, Inha t
Inna: "uuubet segs akw, wa d acengu n wa. Ma tusa kwen id nnhaya, s$uoI, win iddan d nnhaya iW, ur ipputellef, ur i$webbel
Win iooan asmekti W, tameddurt is d tucmip. Ass n tnekra, a t Nefser d ader$al
A d yini: "a Mass iw! Acimi iyi Tfesrev d ader$al, ni$ lli$ pwali
A d Yini: "akken i k id iusan ssekniyen nne£, teppuv iten, akken ara tepwappuv, assa
Akka ay Nepqeiii win izegren tilas, ur numin s issekniyen n Mass is. U, s tidep, aaaqeb n laxeot iwaao kteo, u ad idum kteo
Day ur ten inha ara waceal isuta i Nesqucc, uqbel nnsen? La leeeun $ef tnezdu$in nnsen. Deg wayagi, s tidep, d issekniyen i imawlan n ddehn
Lemmer ur d izwar ara wawal, s$uo Mass ik, akked lajel ipwassnen, yili, war ccekk, iuao uaaqeb
Ihi, bibb ayen d qqaoen, sbuccaa s ccekoan Mass ik, uqbel ad inqeo yiiij, uqbel ad i$li, deg iv. Anez di levouf n wass, amar fellak aoavi
Ur ppara allen ik ar wayen i Nefka i kra n twaculin nnsen. D ajeooig n tmeddurt di ddunit, iwakken a ten Njeooeb yis. A$iti n Mass ik yif it, u ad idum kteo
Ameo taeallit i twacult ik, eerz ip. Ur ak Nessutur ooeeq, d Nekwni ara k Ioeeqen. Laaquba d aeezzeb
Nnan: "a lemmer i $ d iusi s ussekni s$uo Mass is"! Day ur ten id iusa ara ubeggen, deg wayen illan di tewoeqtin timezwura
Lemmer iten Nesqucc s uqeiii, uqbel neppa, a d inin, war ccekk: "a Mass nne$! Acimi ur a$ d Tunzev ara amazan? A neddu d issekniyen iK, uqbel a nendell u a neppuqeiii
Ini: "akw, la nepgani. Ihi gganit. A ppissinem anwi i iddan d ubrid ilhan, anwi i ipwanhan
